prod_short_desc: Conquer the bad guys with action hero B.A. Baracus!
prod_long_desc:
Enhance your LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ experience with the A-Team™ Fun Pack featuring B.A. Baracus. Simply attach the minifigure to his LEGO Toy Tag and place him on the LEGO Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game. Then use his special abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies. Add the 3-in-1 B.A.’s Van to boost your gameplay, and then rebuild it into the Fool Smasher and The Pain Plane for upgraded abilities in the game. This set includes a buildable B.A. Baracus and his wrench, a 3-in-1 vehicle, and an Adventure World with a Battle Arena.
Includes a buildable B.A. Baracus minifigure and rebuildable B.A.’s Van.
All characters and models include a detachable LEGO® Toy Tag.
Rebuild B.A’s Van into the Fool Smasher and The Pain Plane.
Place B.A. and his vehicle on the LEGO® Toy Pad and join the action in the game.
Activate his abilities like A-Team™ Master Build, Laser Redirect, Super Strength and Fit-It to solve puzzles and fight off enemies.
Unlocks the A-Team™ Adventure World and Battle Arena.
Collect your favorite LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and use them in-game together for a crazy mash-up multiverse.
Visit LEGO.com/DIMENSIONS for more information on this exciting LEGO® building and video-gaming experience. Ask your parents’ permission.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ Starter Pack and internet connection required.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ expansion packs unlock additional content.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and vehicles are required to interact with the LEGO DIMENSIONS video game.
B.A.'s Van measures over 1” high, 1” long and 1” wide (alternative 3-in-1 vehicle builds vary in size).
